Barrage.display_help: You perform a quick punch that deals moderate smashing and energy damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast

Bone_Smasher.display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of smashing and energy damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Assassins_Strike.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior energy and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Placate.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Placate {PlayerDest}.
You Placate {PlayerDest}.
messages.display_victim_hit: You have been Placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.

Stun.display_help: By focusing your internal energy on your fists, you can turn them into personal tasers. This Stun attack deals minor smashing and energy damage, but has the best chance to Disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Energy_Transfer.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme smashing and energy damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Unlike other Stalker primary attack powers, Energy Transfer cannot land a Critical hit. However, if this attack is executed successfully while Hidden, you can avoid the Hit Point loss to yourself and deal a massive blow with no penalty. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating smashing and energy attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. A Critical hit with Total Focus deals extra damage, but not double. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
